import React from "react"; import logo from "../../logo.svg"; import './header-styles.css' import {RegistrationModalComponent} from "../Register/RegistrationModalComponent"; import LoginModalComponent from "../Login/LoginModalComponent"; import {logoutUser} from "../../services/services"; export default class NavBarComponent extends React.Component { logout = () => { logoutUser().then(response => { this.props.history.push('/') }) }; render() { let pathVariable = ''; if (this.props.login) { pathVariable = 'userdashboard' } console.log(this.props.login); return (
this.props.history.push(`/${pathVariable}`)} > TravelOPort
{!this.props.login && <>
} {this.props.login &&

Hi {this.props.user.first}!

this.props.history.push( '/')} >Home this.props.history.push( '/search')} >Flights this.props.history.push( '/search/hotels')} >Hotels this.props.history.push( '/profile')}>Profile Settings this.props.history.push( '/privacy')} >Privacy Logout
}
) } }
